name: Dirty Rotten Stinkers
description:
Please be patient it may take a minute to load...

CONTROLS 

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click

Pause - Right Click / Escape

Graphics settings and sensitivity settings are in the pause menu!

Fight your way through endless zombies as they get increasingly more resiliant and more frequent, find pick ups along the way to aid you in your fight.

Stay alive and kill as many zombies as possible to rank amongst the top of the leaderboards!

Created for the Scorespace x Ultimate Arcade Jam with the theme DECAY

All asetts were made bespoke for this jam.

ENJOY! I hope to see you at the top of the scoreboard!
